entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Humidity: 76 %

Dewpoint: -7.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Rain showers beginning near noon changing to flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
